subject: Password Reset
content: We received a password reset request for your account on fundraisingquizzes.net. If you did not make this request, please ignore this e-mail.
To reset your password please click here.
After clicking the link, you'll be directed to a page where you can create a new password. This link will expire in 24 hours.
Do not share this e-mail or link with anyone, as it may compromise your account and personal information.
This e-mail was sent automatically. Do not reply to this e-mail.
